title: "Team creates novel rabies viral vectors for neural circuit mapping"
excerpt: "A research team has created 20 new recombinant rabies viral vectors for neural circuit mapping that offer a range of significant advantages over existing tools, including the ability to detect microstructural changes in models of aging and Alzheimer's disease brain neurons."
